item.title: Transformer Overview
item.description: reference: [1]. The Transformer Family [2]. Attention [3]. 细节考究 Transformer Family Notations Symbol Meaning $d$ The model size / hidden state dimension / positional encoding size. $h$ The number of heads in multi-head attention layer. $L$ The segment length of input sequence. $X \in \mathbb R ^ {L \times d}$ The input sequence where each element has been mapped into an embedding vector of shape , same
